column1: Funeral Services will be held on Monday
column3: 2015 at 11:00 a.m. at McCommons Chapel with Rev. James Mooneyhan officiating. The family will receive friends from 10:00 a.m. until time for the service on Monday at McCommons Funeral Home.  Graveside Services will be on Tuesday
column5: 2015 at 11:00 a.m. at Sunset Memory Gardens
